description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to communicate telepathically with animals. The user can hear animals' thoughts and speak to them mentally, making them an Animal Whisperer Human.

users.circumstances: Apis consumed the fruit at some point before the Warship Island arc, allowing her to communicate with Ryu and other animals.

abilityReveals.description: Apis uses her ability throughout the arc to communicate with Ryu, understanding his wishes and translating his thoughts for the Straw Hats.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Apis's connection with Ryu is central to the entire arc, allowing her to understand his dream of returning to the Lost Island.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Only works on animals, not humans

strengths.description: The user can communicate with any animal, gaining valuable information and potentially forming alliances with creatures.
Apis demonstrated the ability to get weather warnings from birds, showing practical applications for navigation.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to make their fingernails extremely long and sharp, capable of releasing razor-sharp wind slashes that can cut through various materials. This makes the user a Sickle Human.

users.circumstances: Eric, known as 'Eric the Whirlwind', consumed this fruit before the Warship Island arc, using it as his primary weapon as a mercenary.

abilityReveals.description: Eric extends his sharp fingernails and slashes through the air, creating razor-sharp wind blades that can cut opponents from a distance.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Eric uses this ability throughout his battles in the arc and finally uses it against Nelson Royal in episode 60.

abilityReveals.description: Eric can extend his fingernails to significant lengths, making them sharp enough to use as direct cutting weapons in close combat.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used throughout Eric's confrontations with the Straw Hat Pirates.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Requires hand movements to create wind slashes

strengths.description: Can attack enemies from a distance with sharp wind blades, providing both offensive and defensive capabilities.
Can be used for both close-quarters combat with extended claws and ranged attacks with wind slashes.
